document_data.name: Five Point
document_data.mainbody: '''Five Point''' was the name used by a powerful [[hybsil]] [[druid]] active in the [[Silver Marches]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].While not stated in explicitly in ''[[Monster Compendium: Monsters of Faerûn]]'', the name "Five Point" is likely in reference to the number of points on his antlers.
document_data.Relationships: He was always accompanied by his [[animal companion]]s: three [[dire wolves]] and an [[owl]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Five Point was the leader of the second-largest [[druid circle]] in [[the North]]. He had become infamous for posting bounties of thirteen [[gold pieces]] for the scalps of [[Zhentarim]] members in retaliation for their practice of posting bounties on hybasil antlers.
